targets.rawSql:
select 
  concat('Site: ',clients_site.name,' / HostName: ', agents_agent.hostname,' ',agents_agent.DESCRIPTION)
from 
  agents_agent
  LEFT OUTER JOIN clients_site on agents_agent.site_id = clients_site.id
  where 
    agents_agent.hostname = '$Agent'

select   
CASE
  WHEN (count(*) = 1) THEN 'Connected'
  WHEN (count(*) = 0) THEN 'Not Connected'
  ELSE ''
 END AS modifiedpvc
  
 from 
  agents_agent
 where 
   agents_agent.hostname = '$Agent'  and
   last_seen > NOW()- interval '1 hours'

SELECT 
  concat(
          to_char(now() - to_timestamp(boot_time) ,'DD' ),' Days ', 
          to_char(now() - to_timestamp(boot_time),'HH24' ), ' Hours ',
          to_char(now() - to_timestamp(boot_time),'MI' ), ' Minutes '
        )
From 
  agents_agent
Where
  agents_agent.hostname = '$Agent'

panels.description: Track CPU consumption for the selected agent.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  x AS "time",
  y as "CPU Load"
  FROM checks_checkhistory
  
  WHERE x BETWEEN $__timeFrom() and $__timeTo() --'2021-07-01T13:54:25.526Z' AND '2100-07-02T19:54:25.526Z'
  AND check_id IN (SELECT id FROM checks_check WHERE agent_id=(SELECT id FROM agents_agent where agents_agent.hostname = '$Agent') AND check_type='cpuload')
  ORDER BY x

panels.title: CPU Load

panels.description: Track memory consumption for the selected agent.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  x AS "time",
  y as "Memory Usage"
FROM 
  checks_checkhistory
WHERE 
  x BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo() AND 
  check_id IN (SELECT id FROM checks_check WHERE agent_id=(SELECT id FROM agents_agent where agents_agent.hostname = '$Agent') AND check_type='memory')
  ORDER BY x

panels.title: Memory Usage

panels.description: Track disk consumption for the selected agent.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  x AS "time",
  y as "Disk Usage"
FROM 
  checks_checkhistory
WHERE 
   x BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo() 
  AND check_id IN (SELECT id FROM checks_check WHERE agent_id=(SELECT id FROM agents_agent where agents_agent.hostname = '$Agent') AND check_type='diskspace')
  ORDER BY x

panels.title: Drive Usage

targets.rawSql:
select  
  concat(wmi_detail->'cpu'->0->0->>'Name',' \ ',wmi_detail->'base_board'->0->0->>'Manufacturer')
from 
  agents_agent
where 
   agents_agent.hostname = '$Agent'

select   
  concat(SUBSTRING(agents_agent.operating_system,'(.*),'),' ', wmi_detail->'cpu'->0->0->>'DataWidth',' Bit') 
  
from 
  agents_agent
where 
     agents_agent.hostname = '$Agent'

SELECT
  CASE
   WHEN (has_patches_pending = true) THEN 'Windows not up to date'
    WHEN (has_patches_pending = false) THEN 'Windows up to date'
  ELSE 'nothing'
 END AS  Status
FROM 
  agents_agent
where
     agents_agent.hostname = '$Agent'

select
  CASE
   WHEN (agents_agent.needs_reboot = true) THEN 'Reboot required'
    WHEN (agents_agent.needs_reboot = false) THEN 'No reboot required'
  ELSE 'nothing'
 END AS  Status
From 
  agents_agent
Where
  agents_agent.hostname = '$Agent'

select   
   concat((total_ram),'GB / ',concat(wmi_detail->'mem'->0->0->>'Speed','MHz'))
  
from 
  agents_agent
where 
  agents_agent.hostname = '$Agent'

select 
  concat(items.device,'\ ', items.free,' free on ',items.total)
from 
  agents_agent,
  jsonb_to_recordset(disks) as items(device text, free text, total text)
Where
  agents_agent.hostname = '$Agent'

select
  disks->0->>'percent' as "Occupation"
from 
  agents_agent
where 
  agents_agent.hostname = '$Agent'

panels.title: Information on Client or selected site

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  count(*)
FROM agents_agent
where 
  site_id IN (SELECT id FROM clients_site WHERE site_id IN (SELECT id FROM clients_site WHERE name IN ($Sites))) and
  site_id IN (SELECT id FROM clients_site WHERE client_id IN (SELECT id FROM clients_client WHERE name IN ($Client)))
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  count(*)
  FROM alerts_alert
Where
 alerts_alert.severity = 'info' 
 AND alerts_alert.resolved = false

SELECT
  count(*)
  FROM alerts_alert
Where
 alerts_alert.severity = 'warning' 
 AND alerts_alert.resolved = false

SELECT
  count(*) as "error"
  FROM alerts_alert
Where
 alerts_alert.severity = 'error'  
 AND alerts_alert.resolved = false

select (
SELECT
  count(*)
  FROM agents_agent
Where
  SUBSTRING(agents_agent.operating_system,POSITION(',' in agents_agent.operating_system)+2,2) = '64' and
  site_id IN (SELECT id FROM clients_site WHERE site_id IN (SELECT id FROM clients_site WHERE name IN ($Sites))) and
  site_id IN (SELECT id FROM clients_site WHERE client_id IN (SELECT id FROM clients_client WHERE name IN ($Client)))) as "64 Bit",

  (SELECT
  count(*)
  FROM agents_agent
Where
  SUBSTRING(agents_agent.operating_system,POSITION(',' in agents_agent.operating_system)+2,2) = '32' and
   site_id IN (SELECT id FROM clients_site WHERE site_id IN (SELECT id FROM clients_site WHERE name IN ($Sites))) and
  site_id IN (SELECT id FROM clients_site WHERE client_id IN (SELECT id FROM clients_client WHERE name IN ($Client)))) as "32 Bit"

SELECT 
  count(*) as "count",
  SUBSTRING(agents_agent.operating_system,'(.*)v') AS "Operating System"
FROM agents_agent
  INNER JOIN clients_site ON agents_agent.site_id = clients_site.id
  INNER JOIN clients_client ON clients_site.client_id = clients_client.id
WHERE
  clients_client.name IN ($Client)
  AND clients_site.name IN ($Sites)
Group by "Operating System"
Order by "count" desc

SELECT 
  count(*) as "count",
  SUBSTRING(wmi_detail->'cpu'->0->0->>'Name',' (.*)(?:with|Processor|@)') as "CPU Name"
  FROM agents_agent
INNER JOIN clients_site on site_id = clients_site.id
WHERE site_id IN (SELECT id FROM clients_site WHERE client_id IN (SELECT id FROM clients_client WHERE name IN ($Client)))
AND site_id IN (SELECT id FROM clients_site WHERE site_id IN (SELECT id FROM clients_site WHERE name IN ($Sites)))
Group by "CPU Name"
Order by "count" desc

SELECT 
  count(*) as "count",
  concat((total_ram),' GB') as "Size Memory"
  FROM agents_agent
INNER JOIN clients_site on site_id = clients_site.id
WHERE site_id IN (SELECT id FROM clients_site WHERE client_id IN (SELECT id FROM clients_client WHERE name IN ($Client)))
AND site_id IN (SELECT id FROM clients_site WHERE site_id IN (SELECT id FROM clients_site WHERE name IN ($Sites)))
Group by "Size Memory"
Order by "count" desc

SELECT 
  clients_site.name AS "Site",
  hostname AS "Hostname",
  description as "Description",
  last_seen AS "Last Response",
  to_timestamp(boot_time) AS "Last Reboot"
FROM agents_agent
INNER JOIN clients_site on site_id = clients_site.id

WHERE 
site_id IN (SELECT id FROM clients_site WHERE client_id IN (SELECT id FROM clients_client WHERE name IN ($Client)))
AND site_id IN (SELECT id FROM clients_site WHERE site_id IN (SELECT id FROM clients_site WHERE name IN ($Sites)))

SELECT 
    alerts_alert.alert_time as "Date",
    alerts_alert.message as "Message"
FROM alerts_alert
    LEFT JOIN checks_check on alerts_alert.assigned_check_id = checks_check.id
    LEFT JOIN autotasks_automatedtask on alerts_alert.assigned_task_id = autotasks_automatedtask.id
    INNER JOIN agents_agent ON alerts_alert.agent_id = agents_agent.id
                            OR autotasks_automatedtask.agent_id = agents_agent.id
                            OR checks_check.agent_id = agents_agent.id
    INNER JOIN clients_site ON agents_agent.site_id = clients_site.id
    INNER JOIN clients_client ON clients_site.client_id = clients_client.id
WHERE
  clients_client.name IN ($Client)
  AND clients_site.name IN ($Sites)
  AND alerts_alert.severity = 'error' 
  AND alerts_alert.resolved = false

list.definition:
SELECT
    clients_site.name
FROM
    clients_site
    INNER JOIN clients_client ON clients_site.client_id = clients_client.id
WHERE
    clients_client.name IN ($Client)
list.label: Site
list.name: Sites
list.query:
SELECT
    clients_site.name
FROM
    clients_site
    INNER JOIN clients_client ON clients_site.client_id = clients_client.id
WHERE
    clients_client.name IN ($Client)

list.definition:
SELECT
    agents_agent.hostname
FROM
    agents_agent
    INNER JOIN clients_site ON agents_agent.site_id = clients_site.id
    INNER JOIN clients_client ON clients_site.client_id = clients_client.id
WHERE
    clients_client.name IN ($Client)
    AND clients_site.name IN ($Sites)
list.label: Agent
list.name: Agent
list.query:
SELECT
    agents_agent.hostname
FROM
    agents_agent
    INNER JOIN clients_site ON agents_agent.site_id = clients_site.id
    INNER JOIN clients_client ON clients_site.client_id = clients_client.id
WHERE
    clients_client.name IN ($Client)
    AND clients_site.name IN ($Sites)
